summary: Digital Marketing Specialist with extensive experience across digital channels including social media, analytics, SEO/SEM, email marketing, and cross-border marketing. Skilled in data analysis, campaign optimization, and cross-functional collaboration to drive acquisition, engagement, and ROI.

experience.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
experience.description: Strategic management of e-commerce and digital marketing initiatives; integrate search marketing with broader channels; analyze data to uncover opportunities; coordinate cross-functional project plans; ensure timely project completion and senior management communication. Responsibilities span digital operations, content architecture, site optimization, cross-platform compatibility, demand generation, and marketing automation.

experience.title: Marketing and Innovative Partnership Manager
experience.description: Created resources to educate teachers, prospective students, and parents on opportunities and high-tech education; gathered competitor and student demographic data; designed surveys; produced multimedia presentations for awards and partnerships; supported Ringling College collaboration initiatives.

experience.title: Marketing Director
experience.description: Proposed and implemented pricing tier changes for sponsorships; planned and executed marketing strategies to improve profitability; directed Sarasota Film Festival marketing communications; developed a 2014 Festival marketing plan that increased box office revenue; ensured consistent messaging across print, radio, TV, and digital media.

experience.title: Marketing Consultant and Creative Manager
experience.description: Advised small businesses on SEO and digital marketing strategies; managed websites and social media; built WordPress sites; developed organization-wide social media standards; designed digital image assets for clients.
